title: VERO Metadata Schema - extended from ERC721 Metadata JSON Schema

name.description: Identifies the asset to which this NFT represents. Required

description.description: Describes the asset to which this NFT represents. Required

external_url.description: A URI pointing to a single, public record for the real object, which lists the real object owner and the unique identifiers. Required

image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this NFT represents. Optional

model.description: A URI pointing to 3D model representing the asset to which this NFT represents, which is required to become a VERO. File must be freely available and not behind any access control gating. Required

animation_url.description: A URI pointing to 3D model that will be shown interactively on sites. Use either GLB or GLTF 3D model file formats. Optional

youtube_url.description: A URL pointing to a Youtube video highlighting the VERO. Optional
